pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Wrapper for 'agena.ai' API // An R wrapper for 'agena.ai' https://www.agena.ai which provides users capabilities to work with 'agena.ai' using the R environment. Users can create Bayesian network models from scratch or import existing models in R and export to 'agena.ai' cloud or local API for calculations. Note: running calculations requires a valid 'agena.ai' API license (past the initial trial period of the local API).
